Many thanks for sharing your unique work...+1...A10-V10...
Live Long and Prosper...
Spirit...

@ ALL - Please LOGIN (create an account if you do not have one) and click the [+] symbol beside QUALITY at top of page for ALL torrents you DL from 20-40.  It makes a difference; shows you care and that his work is appreciated! Don't forget to seed back at least 1/1...

Be Cool !
@"-"guy: Fuck off! - carry your mental issues some place else ...

@redvanilla: LOL, I am on same place as you, not always... but...
Can you imagine sort of giggles this guy gets, ever time changing proxy server just to click once?

Funny how many of these guys defends stupid Quality button on TPB, even if anyone sane knows for years that doesn't make big difference - but gives opportunity to idiots, payed shills by MPAA and other Copyright agencies to effectively scare people pressing "-" or screaming "Fake" even when that's not true.

There is none sane reason for "+/-" - none whatsoever.
